def calculate_inversion_number(N, K, A):
    mod = 10 ** 9 - 7
    p = 0
    p_ = 0
    for (i, j) in enumerate(A):
        p += len(list(filter(lambda x: x > j, A)))
        p_ += len(list(filter(lambda x: x < j, A[i:])))
    ans = p_ * K + p * K * (K - 1) // 2
    return ans % mod
